name: Omnitrix Simulator (godiraju)
description:
Harsha Gadiraju, Sawyer Nguyen, Yahya Kousa - Genius Hour Project 2020-2021

*** DOES NOT WORK ON CHROMEBOOKS, ONLY WINDOWS AND MAC ***

(Please give it a few seconds to load, the first load of the game takes a bit)

(also it doesn't seem to load in incognito mode so refrain from using that)

This game is a "simulator" of the Omnitrix device from Ben 10. The Omnitrix is a database of alien DNA that allows the wearer to transform into the selected alien. In this simulator, choosing an alien displays information and trivia about that alien, rather than transforming the player. We hope you enjoy!
